Body:
n = 100
a = ot.datasets.make_1D_gauss(n, m=20, s=5)
b1 = ot.datasets.make_1D_gauss(n, m=60, s=8)
b2 = ot.datasets.make_1D_gauss(n, m=30, s=4)
b = np.vstack((b1, b2)).T
M = ot.utils.dist0(n)
M /= np.median(M)
epsilon = 0.1
G, log = ot.bregman.sinkhorn(a, b, M, reg=epsilon, method=
    'sinkhorn_stabilized', log=True)
G2, log2 = ot.bregman.sinkhorn(a, b, M, epsilon, method='sinkhorn', log=True)
np.testing.assert_allclose(G, G2)
